name: Toasted Dreams
description:
You're a toast who's having a nightmare/dream where you have to survive the evil butters as long as you can to avoid getting toasted.

Controls:

Up Arrow - Move Up

Down Arrow - Move Down

Made for Ludum Dare 46

#LudumDareJam #LudumDare46 #SideScroller #Family #Kitchen #Delicious #arcade
